page.title: 04CHILDRENS GAMES ABBEY WOOD
page.content:
The game I play with my brother is FOOTSTEPS.This is the way to play.One person stands against the wall with his hands on his eyes,the other people stand about 5m away.The wall person says "footsteps footsteps 1,2,3," and in that time the people on the line run up to him without him seeing.If the wall person sees someone move as he turns round they have to go back to the beginning.If someone gets to the wall person without getting seen they stand against the wall and the game starts again. KERRY AGE 11
To play STUCK IN THE MUD the person who is 'he' has to touch someone.They have to stand with their arms up.To get them free other people have to go under their arms.When they have all been touched the last one to get touched is 'he'. GEORGINA AGE 11
